body_html: Yes, it's by design. Distributed filesystems like GCS are designed for write once, read multiple times. You shouldn't rely on the content of the "checkpoint" file, because you need to read/write it multiple times.
body_text: Yes, it's by design.  Distributed filesystems like GCS are designed for write once, read multiple times.  You shouldn't rely on the content of the "checkpoint" file, because you need to read/write it multiple times.
body: Yes, it's by design.  Distributed filesystems like GCS are designed for write once, read multiple times.  You shouldn't rely on the content of the "checkpoint" file, because you need to read/write it multiple times.
